attributes.action: ban the sale in the UK of new private vehicles that emit more than 225 g/Km of CO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The rise in global temperatures through carbon emissions and the rising demand for oil means that we should question whether the sale of ‘gas guzzling’ cars is morally acceptable. Thus the ability of people to be profligate with the Earth’s resources simply because they have the financial resources to do so has to be challenged. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ban the sale in the UK of new private vehicles that emit more than 225 g/Km of CO.
